ai22PB2HwEI6MwcpwVNBpw.text: This is a great place to hang out or meet up with friends! The service is friendly and helpful. Another bonus- they make the prettiest lattes!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

6xakca_9LIobeGUafJ3aXA.text: Delicious deserts and tea. We had the lavender honey latte, mini apple rose, white grape tea and chocolate raspberry cake. Will definitely be going back to try the rest of their menu. Comfortable seating, clean, quick service.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yum

kIgbHW_kVFG_OvoInZY8sA.text: We had a late breakfast and found it flavorful and satisfying. Very well conceived crepe dishes with good ingredients, plus great coffee and tea (my wife got tea in a special steeping cup). The menu has a tasty Eastern European slant, which I welcome to the neighborhood.

6CQlnKOEZdDpDmyQBPgVhw.text: This is the BEST cafe ever!!!! It has a beautiful ambiance and the service is beyond exceptional!!!! The pastries are absolutely delicious and the coffee definitely exceeds all other local coffee in the community. I would like to give special thanks to Mariama and Haley for their friendly and outstanding service!!!! They always welcome me with a smile and make the best coffee

m49jzXT-1LRu_-g_E6XHvg.text: My friends and I tried both the Turkey/Bacon crepe and the Strawberry Nutella, both delicious. Our absolute favorite was the HONEY LAVENDER LATTE, MUST MUST TRY!  Staff were all so sweet.

eQ1auruHy7D609AWl6gYCw.text: Food was absolutely amazing! I had a crepe and it was so good. They made it fr sh while I was waiting which was awesome. The owner was so friendly and out going and very hands on. I would totally recommend the food here but even if it wasn't very good the owners personality would have made up for it. A++++ establishment.

NH8o-dYdLaDVOwjiLsd91g.text: This place is incredible! Every aspect is a pleasure! From cozy seating to delicious coffee and crepes..Crema has it all! Friendly service and a welcoming atmosphere will greet you as soon as you walk it!

N-uwcioJr2e1sbIhvTnLQg.text: What an amazing find!!! This place is awesome...I took my friend there for our first visit.  She had always said she did not like crepes.  She not only loved her crepe she ate the whole thing and can't wait to come back.  There is such a nice selection of pastries, I can't wait to try them all.   BTW...I had the bavarian cream crepe.  It was the perfect blend of ingredients...I will be a frequent visitor.  Also don't be fooled by the name they have a great selection of teas as well.  We were greated at the front door by whom I'm guessing is the owner/manager.  She gave us a full description of each pastry.  She was very friendly and helpful.  Give this place a try, I'm sure it will not be your last.   Let's put this place on Charlotte's most wanted list... : ) Looking forward to seeing you there...

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

jkqK6o6xLvUzniHQN2V33A.text: Pastries are very tasty and professional, crepes are the best one and very  delicious too, not too crispy and not too soft. Thank you

yTDKpAEE_tX-Q3Lp5WbpgA.text: Love, love, love this place! Sweet or Savory Crepes; Coffee any-way-you-take-it. Wine, Beer, Kombucha, friendly staff etc. They make all the crepes while you wait RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU.   Sometimes, I just can't.   - M  P.S. It's beautiful inside, too!

vnGJ8m1gvO7_EevMDQlyYA.text: This place is amazing!! Best coffee in Charlotte!!Great customer service and a wonderful variety of food and beverage options. The Bakery selections consisted of beautifully crafted low sugar and gluten free options. They looked too pretty to eat. We really enjoyed our Sunday afternoon treat at Crema in Dilworth.

JpxYKBGmF1DeL6yzt_wv1w.text: So glad I picked Crema. I have been visiting a new coffee shops every Friday morning after my night shift. Mariana explained the expresso menu and she fixed me one and loved it. I also got a crepe that was made right in front of me. Delicious.  Everything from the decor, service , coffee is AWESOME. Can't wait to visit for $5 mimosas! I will definitely be back.

0uHE7oA4I6hK0-6kJRmixA.text: I was there only briefly but it had great atmosphere and the service was quick. I ordered a tea. They had a large variety of unique teas. Perfect way to start my day.

F_2-TVYaKZi35MwXQxeeHA.text: Wonderful coffee place! I've got coffee and crape and spend half an hour on laptop. Great place to relax and take a little break in a busy day! Service was friendly and fast.

7Urs6gpEcE3k13Pph6_BeQ.text: Super cute, the employees were very nice and helpful and the coffee and crepe were so good! A really nice energy, tucked away in Dilworth. Many lavender lattes I've had in Charlotte are Lavender Vanilla, but theirs is a Honey Lavender--a refreshing twist.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Honey Lavender Latte (small) - $4.06 with tax
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

Ar5sJKh0C5NWp7_kxCOUrw.text: This was our favorite breakfast place.  During our first couple of visits, we used to get military discount. To my surprise, they said "no" when I asked to get it this past Saturday.  We are no longer supporting this local place due to the way we were treated the last time.  There are ways to tell your customers you are no longer giving "xyz discount".  I am never coming back.  I felt humiliated by the staff.

sZFVOVPrX8JvW2BlRDfpBQ.text: Awesome ppl, awesome coffee...  decor is warm and cozy.  Crepe selections is pleasant.  Will be back.

4h_CrVPGRv97QDtfyHDJ8Q.text: Friendly staff, beautiful decor, and delicious food and drink. First time here, but we will be back.

jkDRB3cGwm0uxEOT91W6Ww.text: I have never been so pleased with a cafe. Delicately crafted drinks made to cater each customers expectations on top of the most exquisite crepes and unique European desserts/pastries. The ambiance is fabulous so if you don't have time to stick around your first visit- I guarantee you will the next! All the girls there are always helpful as well and make sure each experience is more memorable than the last. Love, love, love!

jYzowSFx8-u3z-jSmtv-dQ.text: Very excited to finally visit this place. The onwer seemed genuinely nice and passionate. Very cute and cozy place, warm decore and atmosphere. Will be back for more!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. The after math! No regrets!

Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Had a cortado with this fabulous dark chocolate covered blueberry bon bon. Husband got a macchiato and a cream puff with fresh berries !
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Brand new coffee and European pastry shop located at Kenilworth commons!

ASICR-rafgaW0ZEiD5vcMA.text: We ordered two crepes, one "hamster" and one Greek. We couldn't find the egg. The latte was very weak. Will never be back.

G5oV6Xn8hGROwk7JUwmhLA.text: Everyone raves about Crepes, I didn't understand what all the fuss was about until I came here.  Crepes can in fact, be delicious. Coffee is phenomenal as well.

SUBwtzSiwDZzIpg5KYndWA.text: I looooove this place. It's just perfect! Great coffee and treats. Real cups and plates, too. This place is my favorite.

zAPdPCsqWk3duSkvFYauyg.text: I enjoyed an outstanding brunch this morning with wife at Crema Expresso Bar and Cafe.  Two different breakfast crepes, a shared pistachio-raspberry eclair, honey-lavendar coffees and great service. We will be back for more.

e3VhyqnYqtAAhutsPxX3_g.text: Nice loose leaf tea selection, good French vibe, attentive staff, amazing and unique desserts... I'm impressed!

QLTzCZ_oBbqD3BAYOQJRvg.text: Cozy place with friendly service. The pastries were pretty but didn't taste great. I got a chai latte which was very yummy and a good price compared to other coffee shops!

1LO52zuNoyYFa1ubr_Xm6w.text: It's my first time to have Affogato in Charlotte! It tastes great. Enjoyed the chat time with my friends here. I think I have the same music taste with who chose the music in the cafe~ I like old songs! I want to see more options for desserts.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

bmLIM5DmXZDSui08ykCRKw.text: I'm in town on business and found this wonderful cafe close to the hotel. Delicious crepe made to order by the very friendly owner and excellent tea - happiness is choosing here for breakfast over the hotel!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Vegan version crepe with avocado mushroom and spinach

HWp2xsBkMUxuh1iLv-iQmw.text: I don't have a single complaint about this place. Completely met my expectations and then some!  I was looking for a nice spot for us girls to go for brunch while we were in Charlotte on a bachelorette party and this was the perfect spot! They have so many coffee, espresso, and latte options. You cannot go wrong with the strawberry, banana, nutella crepe if you're looking for something sweet or the turkey, cheese, avocado crepe if you're looking for something savory. The establishment is clean. The service is impeccable. The food is to die for. Cannot go wrong! Highly recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Super cute decor inside the restaurant.
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Strawberry, Banana, Nutella crepe is to die for!
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. a champagne toast and some honey lavender lattes to start the morning!

X_Ki4CYtN5pT96G8JwG0eg.text: Fun local coffee place with amazing bakery .  Staff friendly and professional.  Small and local, what could be better?

ETiiZfJl8pMrfKg70jplbQ.text: I really appreciate this place.  Great coffee, unique healthy food choices, and nice ambiance.  Owner is very friendly, cares about her products, and very conscious of her ingredient choices to ensure high quality and locally sourced.

4vzFUFnkSGsVF2B6xKNzwA.text: Wandered into Crema while running errands. I like to try whatever food or beverage might be unique to a company. The girl waiting on me recommended a honey lavender espresso drink.   It was warm and smooth with none of the of the sugary aftertaste that can linger in your mouth. A bit of milk (you can also choose from diff milk substitutes). Subtle aroma of lavender -very sophisticated. Just the right amount of caffeine pick me.  Didn't get to try the huge dessert selection or hang out that long on this trip, so I gave Crema 4 stars. I'll be back in to try everything.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Couldn&#39;t stay, coffee to-go

Lmj0JuAWMLeSSkTjINSz_w.text: Absolutely wonderful experience. Friendly service & clean environment. My sisters and I got the fruit puff, raspberry lemon tart, and honey lavender expresso. We were worried it was going to be too sweet but it wasn't! It had just the perfect hint of sweetness. We had an amazing experience & will be back. Also, the lavender honey expresso had to be one of the best coffee drinks I've ever had (& I drink a lot of coffee).

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

WY1nZOm67qfEcv9B7L74rA.text: I cannot get over how amazing this place is not only in terms of the high quality of their beverages which are crafted with care, but also their superb attentive service. Stopped in the other day with a friend after a long day of being out in the sun, but couldn't decide on what I wanted. The barista was more than happy to not only give recommendations, but to customize anything to my liking. I know that is what coffee shops are supposed to do, but typically in most stores people get upset when you try to make changes to their established drinks. Ended up getting a matcha latte with espresso and was not disappointed. Will definitely be back to try their creative tea lattes, desserts, and wine tastings!

rIjWk-3NQKB_KSrIpADe7Q.text: Amazing desserts and coffees. I go out of my way to come here, wish they had a location in Mint Hill!

l33Z3p5I-TDwItJP49jhNg.text: If you want an authentic coffee shop, this is for you. A mix of elegance and relaxation, Crema is perfect for a coffee and pastry or glass of wine and crepe. Take in the swan eclairs and apple roses that are only seen on Pinterest, yet here they are just two of the delicious in house made pastries featured in the case. Everywhere should have a coffee shop respite like Creme Espresso.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Honey bun latte and apple rose

h_iNSAer1P5xmXGQME_yvQ.text: I absolutely love everything about Crema, from the ambiance, coffee, food to the staff. The mother/daughter owners, Alexis and Elena, are such beautiful souls and so kind. You feel welcomed and appreciated as a customer.  I have yet to try a coffee or tea that I did not enjoy. I highly recommend giving Crema.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

1DpysZ_u5DKBK-xr2lILKg.text: Adorable place with good coffee and yummy treats!  They also have a menu serving full meals but I have yet to try these. I can however highly recommend the chia bowls! Organic oatmeal + organic chia seeds with fruit and organic maple syrup. I've tried to imitate this at home and it never seems quite as good.  They also have beer and wine (half price glasses on Friday!) so a fun after work spot as well

GCRgUs2YOw1UZjfJvauUXg.text: Found this place on yelp. We were drawn in by the menu of "coffee explanation". See my picture. I opted for honey lavender latte and my daughter chose cinnamon honey iced latte. The  honey lavender was delicious, doesn't need any additional sweetener. The top was sprinkled with lavender(wasn't really sure if i should eat them or spit them out. Lol ) The Coffee was a perfect strength for me.  Iced latte was also very satisfying-laced with honey on the bottom and sprinkles with cinnamon on top. The place is super cute. Great place to sit and do some work on your laptop or even read. Plenty of parking. Would definitely recommend. The barista was super friendly and helpful. They really make you feel welcomed with no pressure to order quickly. They also have lots of pastries to try that are all baked from scratch on the premises. Unfortunately we did not try any this time. If you want more of a breakfast meal they have many options.  If you happen to come later in the day this is also a wine bar as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu outside

virLMOuX2JMuX28rV6SBxQ.text: Love this place. Nice and quiet...think I can sit here the entire afternoon and enjoy the time

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Ice coffee and Napoleon

_LBA1hFIFN7x_rwvc3H_1Q.text: Crema Espresso is so cute! We randomly stumbled upon this wine and dessert bar and it was so good. The owner was so sweet and informed us of all the great events they throw! If you live in the neighborhood or are just visiting this is a great spot for some wine and cheese or even some homemade dessert!

rcYKaX_RI2omkSOKNhB-Aw.text: This is great place to get coffee or tea!  The staff is friendly and they have a ton of options.  I prefer tea and got an iced Vanilla Mint tea that was absolutely awesome.  My friend got an Americana and said it was very good as well.

ppd1tlHEmnqHlXxvhGYq4g.text: Just moved to Charlotte in January and haven't been able to find anywhere that i really loved to be at while getting some work finished. That all changed this week when i went to Crema! The first time i went i ordered the Honeybun Latte and The Health Nut crepe, DELICIOUS! They have free WiFi and it was a great place to sit for a few hours while working. Everyone in there from the staff to the workers are so friendly. When they didn't have the drink i was looking for, Viola quickly recommended a similar drink and adjusted it to my dietary needs. Halfway through doing my work Hailey brought me over a glass of water without me even asking which was very thoughtful. I have already been back a second time and received the same amazing service. I have found my new favorite (and local) coffee shop!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Honeybun Latte with The Health Nut Crepe
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Honeybun Latte

VrGA9RGEBjYd0GQyB552eA.text: This place is the ultimate weekend brunch spot. High quality and large selection of coffees and loose leaf teas, European pastries and crepes (sweet and savory). Wine and beer on the horizon;) Don't walk, run to check it out before the crowds find out.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

1jglntZKqztqQsomjv7mqg.text: Absolutely Delicious. You have to drink the Honey Lavender Latte! Paired with the Berry Puff pastry. Deeeevine.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

B6J_4o5aROAdLyhdsBn62g.text: This was a great place to study, work, and read. It would also work for small meet ups. Loved it! There is wifi and outlets everywhere. Lots of seating. Great natural lighting. Easy parking. You can have brunch, lunch (crepes) and coffee breaks here. Agree on price $.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Matcha latte

s1raJMcsR165jh96TIDsiQ.text: This is my first review I have written but I just had to because of how absolutely WONDERFUL this place is especially the barista Viola! She was amazing willing to do anything to make the costumer happy she was more than happy accommodate any request that a customer asked of her! She was just wonderful! And it is not just the staff that makes this place great it is such an adorable great coffee nook, with amazing coffee and breakfast options!  Cant wait to go back!

E8DT-Ljub1CFi_pgIxNGRw.text: This nicely-designed cafe has some of the best baked goods I've had anywhere. Try the homemade Kiev cake or seven-layer honey cake. They're made with care and you can tell. Flavors are perfectly balanced--well-rounded taste, not overly rich and sweet.  I usually get tea. They serve the good stuff, which is harder to find in Charlotte. Today, I'm sipping a cappuccino, and it's great.   Service is usually friendly and efficient. The space is relaxing, and the location is convenient to other shops and services.

nrdDFdaQUQlluNG6HQ_kIQ.text: I am a little surprised that this is 4.5 stars. Our experience was sub par at best.   The inside and counter in general looked lack luster and almost dirty. The woman at the counter was pretty unimpressed by anything and was borderline rude. She quickly made our almond milk lattes which were basically milk and coffee and told us that almond milk just doesn't foam, which isn't True. We also managed to order two items of food despite it not looking that great and both were okay. I got the banana bread and my husband got the scone. Scone felt like it came from a box.  We won't be back and in general I have to believe that there are better options in the area than this. This is one time that yelp reviews / scores didn't help me!

I5hFr3FnVlHI4Zcmsg9kZg.text: I have passed this place several times on my way shopping in this complex and last Saturday was the day. It was around 2pm when I stopped in. There were two people working and they were both very welcoming and asked me if I had been there before (I had not) and made sure to answer any questions.   I ordered the Honey Bun latte and had to have a Nutella Brownie-hello! I have to say there were both wonderful and I will back as their treats look amazing.  One point to note, which is the same issue with all small businesses--they have a sign up asking you to pay in cash, and this is due to the service fees they have to pay for using cards. Not a hardship unless you are like me and don't carry much cash. But was luckily I had cash because not only do I want to support locally, I don't want prices going up as a result of passing on service fees to the customers. Of course they take cards but it's another way to support locally.

feqPH1FykgrZYtyEumWn0w.text: Such a cute, clean cafe! They serve lots of coffee/espresso options, pastries and all kinds of crepes! We just got coffee but we will definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

zXGScsxunypusu7LTcppLw.text: I love this coffee shop! The owner is so nice and friendly, and it is a great place to study for hours. the desserts are delicious. My favorite dessert is the Ferraro Roche roll. Their child latte is also really good and tasty, and the overall atmosphere and the store is really nice and conducive to a great study environment.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

NC2vjgsrt4Xh2qbSclF0UA.text: Where has this place been all my life??? I can't believe I didn't come here sooner. I had a great experience here. I came after dinner and tried the tiramisu and golden milk. The tiramisu was so good. Also my friend got the tuxedo cake which was delicious as well. Loved the golden milk!! They also have wine here and some snack items.   The customer service was awesome. The girl working was super friendly and I really liked her. If you love tiramisu, please come check it out. They also have many other sweet options to choose from.

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

WDtQ6rKSRD3C-VhvjM9Pzw.text: I often pass Crema when I do my weekly grocery shop at HT, but had never stopped in. Today was the day! I was at home when the internet went out, so I immediately knew I needed to go to a cafe to get a coffee and use the WiFi.   I entered the cafe and there was ample seating. A beautiful high top made of wood was along the left side of the space. Plenty of outlets were available.   I went to the front and ordered an almond milk iced latte. They have all the milks which is great!! I ordered, paid ~4+ for a small and inquired about the WiFi explaining that I had lost internet at home and needed it desperately. I sat at the high top table and proceeded to try and connect to the internet. My laptop was not cooperating.   The sweet woman who took my order brought my latte to the table and asked if I was able to get internet. I wasn't but I kept trying. The coffee was good, strong! My husband will really like it. The pastries looked great too - unfortunately, I didn't try any this time.   My gripe? After sitting in the cafe for about 15-20 minutes with my laptop open the woman let me and another guy sitting there know that they would be closing in about 15 minutes for a private event. She couldn't have been nicer about it, but seriously? I wish that I was told that prior to ordering and making it very obvious that I would be sitting there.   So, overall the coffee was good, the staff was sweet, but be more conscience of people buying and planning to enjoy their coffee and let them know before they order for dine-in that you are closing early!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

g8TT4V47o1yFOviSBsiqxA.text: This review is pretty much about atmosphere alone because DANG Crema nails it.  We hunkered down in the corner (so many cozy pillows) for a Saturday afternoon of productivity. Their barista was so friendly and helpful - she walked us through their whole menu and presented us their incredible-looking pasties (I'll be going back to try those!). She greeted every person who walked through the door, which I loved.   They have tons of tea and coffee options, including a helpful illustration that outlines the different kinds of coffees you can order (wtf is a breve, anyway?).  There are many options for seating, including some stools and lots of tables and chairs. One wall is lined with padded bench seating that includes lots of pillows for comfort (a huge plus). The music wasn't too loud (also a major win) and if you want to be distracted, there's an active parking lot to watch (really, there are lots of people walking by).   I look forward to returning!

3Ld1rvFU6FB4vEkoM_0uhQ.text: I came here for the first time on a Saturday morning at 10 am.   The good: - Comfortable and inviting indoor and outdoor seating options. - Allow you to customize your crepes to fit your preference or dietary needs. - Great location with ample parking.   The bad:  - Takes a long time to order (at the counter) and a long time to get your food. We saw numerous patrons walk in, wait in line for a while, and then leave after seeing that the line wasn't moving. -It doesn't seem that they have enough employees working. The same 2 employees are making the crepes, making the coffee, taking the orders, working the cash register, and cleaning tables.  -We would have enjoyed some side options with our crepes. The price for a single crepe is comparable to prices for a crepe and side at other crepe restaurants in the area.   Overall, the food was fine but not spectacular. The staff were friendly but visibly stressed (too many guests and not enough employees).

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Crema
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Coffee options
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Menu

vmuKjckVZTiHIPe_WAgVhw.text: Cute coffee and dessert spot in the dilworth area. Stopped in for a coffee on a Friday afternoon and there were a lot of spots to sit. They have Wifi so you can grab a coffee and get some work done. The barista was super friendly. I ordered the honeybun almond milk latte. It was great! The desserts looked tasty. I'll be sure to stop back in soon!

Iat9FhLpSfyfhR5kD5lfYQ.text: You guys, this place is great.   I was meeting my BIL for dinner and arrived a bit early. To my delight, Crema was nearby so I could grab an iced tea.   First, know that they close kind of early (6-6:30pm) right now but they're planning to extend that.   Second - know that they they have beer and quite a nice wine list. Glasses of tasty wine are 1/2 off on Fridays yo!! Pair it with some nice cheese and charcuterie plates for a pre dinner nosh.   Third - know that they have a lovely bakery case full of things I want badly to eat but know I probably shouldn't. They explained pastries are "Russian" style and thus less sweet than you might be used to. Had I not had a dinner date, I would have torn it up!  Finally - the staff could not be nicer! My iced tea (mint) was made fresh and I felt truly welcomed.   Go here!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. 1/2 off on Fridays
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Amazing pastry case

WT-cEfPTsUpoyfFhM7iiew.text: This should be called Crema Espresso Bar, European Pastry and Crepe Cafe.  Very good coffees, but excellent European pastries baked on site and the crepes are great too!  Any crepe can be made with eggs (very thin omelettes), which is how I like them. You won't find pastry like this anywhere else in Charlotte.

Zlji8KxSUohVydS-OzJeFw.text: Yummo!  Really enjoyed this place. Great little morning escape. Thank You!!  I will be back.

vhxC5EfzGPBlnWOK9A2Bgg.text: Incredible! That is, if you have a love for crapes or coffee! So happy I found this place!!! It's in the Harris teeter parking lot off East blvd. Yum!!  Wonderful people here! So helpful and willing to cater to all dietary needs. They have a great variety!!  I originally had them with a flamming 5 stars, but changed that when I tasted the to go pastries.   Ordered... Ice coffee with a pump of Carmel and half & half- omg, it's refeshing, fresh, & delicious.  Mint Tea- loved it! It was made with fresh leaves & a fun dispenser   Crepes:      --You can watch them make it-- Sweet Bavarian Crepe- Incredible!  A decadent cream all house made, fresh cut up banana & strawberry.  Custom Savory Crepe- mozzarella & cheddar cheese, light spinach, & avocado. Really wonderful  2nd time ordering the Bavarian crepe        Both were over cooked        My friend had a Brush hair in her crepe =(  Pastries:   -I ordered these to go- Everything tasted so great before I had these.  What a shame! I might not be curious enough to taste any others. One taste and I was done with the three I tried! My friend thought they were only, ok.   Napoleon- Really not as flavorful as I would have liked, meh!  Earl Grey Pound Cake- grainy top almost had a burnt flavor, gross & washed out my mouth.  Berry delightful fruit puff- some berries on top were good, others looked wilted & had good Bavarian cream. The pastry was really dry and tasteless.   Originally... Thrilled about seeing the case of what looked like really amazing pastries. I made a list of all of the ones that caught my attention!! After 3 disappointing flavors, I am now sceptical about trying the rest of my list.   Next time I'd like to try  Bruche (French style)- Mini apple rose- Bravarian cream horn-

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Really great tables with coffee beans in them
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Beer &amp; wine options
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sanitation rating 98% .. Yay  This is where they make your beverages!!

aScwHjZasr2gOBzMu2twjQ.text: Delicious coffee and crepes. Each crepe is made to order right in front of you, same for the coffee, so it takes a little bit of time. Yummy selection of desserts and a variety of baked goods to choose from as well. They offer sweet and savory crepe options

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

XwQuGodJfy0XiQ9zgl80SQ.text: Beautiful space. Calm and quiet inside, with big windows and gorgeous wooden tables. The playlist is always phenomenal. Great selection of coffee and tea, served very hot!

2e3o-C2asaQ0eYxPAQrswg.text: Wow!!!!!  This coffee was awesome and the staff engaging and very nice!!!    Their assistance on the drink and pastry selections were beneficial and literally a fun experience!  I would recommend the Honey Latte with half and half!!!  You can't really write too much on a coffee place visit, but please don't take my lack of words, as an indication of the experience at Crema---probably could be served up in one word when I think about it---FANTASTIC;) lol

7CxK1iTatRHOjpavWB8XAg.text: Lovely cafe next to Harris Teeter! I came in with my mom and ordered 2 different crepes, 2 coffees, and 2 pastries. We loved the personalized service, the cashier made an effort to see what kind of drinks we would like and made some recommendations. The crepes came out so fast and were a huge portion and just delicious. As we were finishing up, they brought out our pastries and coffee. It's not really a full service place, more like you order at the counter and they bring it out to you once it's ready. I like how they still went the extra step and provided table service by bringing out out items in order, I suppose because it wasn't too busy. Come here and support local business! Get one of the crepes with chicken and the lavender latte!

photos.caption: Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Crema Espresso Bar and Cafe - Charlotte, NC, United States

S-q5-g6qgCGCONB4VVYNiQ.text: Holy moly this place is good. The honey bun espresso drink was AMAZING. I love when the drinks sweetness isn't overbearing...I hate feeling like I'm drinking a dessert. This drink was absolutely perfect with an extra shot of espresso.   I also tried the chocolate eclair and the apple turnover. Both pastries were divine...baked perfectly. The turnover had the most buttery, flakey delicious crust. The real star though was definitely the eclair. I am a HUGE fan of this place. I'll definitely return in the future. Can't recommend this place enough.

GUayOIbzzHhYlGF1JepelA.text: Had great visit to this cafe. Great food, amazing deserts , large selection of coffee, teas, wine. Friendly atmosphere.
